Name: DoubleSentinel
Intro: Two sentinels appear and move into attack formation!

Name: Rattlesnake
Intro: A rattlesnake is alarmed by your presence and lunges at you!!

Name: ScorpionNest
Intro: A nest of angry scorpions swarm around you!

Name: SmallPlant
Intro: Toxic, carnivourous plants are drawn by your scent and move in at alarming speed!

Name: BigPlant
Intro: Toxic, carnivourous plants are drawn by your scent and move in at alarming speed!

Name: OneScout
Intro: A drone of unknown origin locks onto you and attacks without warning!

Name: OneSpecter
Intro: A restless spirit turns a baleful gaze towards you!

Name: TwoSpecter
Intro: Restless spirits turn a baleful gaze towards you!!

Name: SteelPatrol
Intro: You are detected by a patrolling squad of Steel Knights!

Name: SteelScout
Intro: You are detected by a patrolling squadron of drone scouts!
